name: GameJam Runner
description:
CONTROLS: A and D to move left and right respectively.

This is my first Game Jam and my first creation. This game is based on a genre where the players runs infinitely. Inspired by Subway Surfers and Temple Run

There is nothing special about this game (yet). I don't expect anyone to play this game; it was made solely for fun and to get more experience. 

But if you want to play and review this game, please do, and thank you :).

The core of the game is finished but there is a lot that can be added, and I am going to keep updating the game.
